Chest pain can be a sign of a serious condition, and it is important to get a proper diagnosis before taking any medication. Your healthcare provider can evaluate your symptoms and determine the appropriate treatment.

Can I take X mg for anxiety?

X mg is not an approved medication for anxiety. Anxiety is typically treated with medications that belong to a class of drugs called benzodiazepines or selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors (SSRIs). Your healthcare provider can recommend the best medication for your specific condition
